thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 08 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Ex-Insys employee in federal kickback case may face state charges

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Ex-Insys employee in federal kickback case may face state charges
text:
A former Insys Therapeutics Inc employee accused by federal prosecutors of engaging in a scheme to pay doctors kickbacks to prescribe a fentanyl-based spray may soon face additional charges by a state attorney general, according to court papers.
Jeffrey Pearlman, a onetime district sales manager at the drugmaker, is one of several former Insys employees and executives to face federal criminal charges amid centered on the companyâ€™s cancer pain treatment Subsys.
To read the full story on WestlawNext Practitioner Insights, click here: bit.ly/2mevt3r
